original_text: Jesus said to them, ‘Do not stop the children. Let them come to me. People must become like these children so that God can rule their lives. That is what the kingdom of heaven is like.’
korean_text: 예수께서 이르시되 어린 아이들을 용납하고 내게 오는 것을 금하지 말라 천국이 이런 사람의 것이니라 하시고

sentences.original_text: People must become like these children
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 이 어린아이들과 같이 되어야 한다

sentences.original_text: so that God can rule their lives
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 그들의 삶을 다스리게 하기 위해

sentences.original_text: That is what the kingdom of heaven is like
